 PROBLEM 2
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
int main()
 
{
char *str1="Intechxication";
char *str2="2012";
char *str3;
str3=strcat(str1,str2);
printf("%s\n",str3);
return 0;
}
Expected Output:  Intechxication2012
 
Rules:  
 

U can add at most 3 lines in given code.
Changing given  lines of code is not allowed.
